content: Hotel skyscraper in Singapore **Pan Pacific Orchard** is a hotel in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) located on Claymore Road, [Orchard](/wiki/Orchard_Road), Singapore. Opened in June 2023, it is part of the [Pan Pacific Hotels and Resorts chain](/wiki/Pan_Pacific_Hotels_and_Resorts). Designed by [WOHA Architects](/wiki/WOHA), It is 140 m high and has four open-air terraces, named Forest, Beach, Garden and Cloud. The hotel has 343 rooms and suites. In 2024, the hotel won the award for the world's best new tall building from the [Council on Tall Buildings and Urban Habitat](/wiki/Council_on_Tall_Buildings_and_Urban_Habitat). - Official website This article about a Singapore building or structure is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. - v - t - e
title: Pan Pacific Orchard
